mean_cn: n.（天体的）食；  v.掩盖……的重要性；使暗淡
mean_en: an occasion when the moon passes between the earth and the sun so that you cannot see all or part of the sun for a time; an occasion when the earth passes between the moon and the sun so that you cannot see all or part of the moon for a time
sentence: A solar eclipse occurs when the moon blocks the sun.
sentence_trans: 当月亮遮盖了太阳，就会发生日食。
word_etyma: ec出 + lipse离开 → eclipse日蚀，月蚀
